name: About Us

content:
Page: About Us
Crimson Hotels & Resorts transforms gatherings into extraordinary experiences. Elevate your events with impeccable service, state-of-the-art facilities, and timeless luxury at our venues, where every detail is curated for a memorable occasion.

name: Dine
keywords: Saffron Cafe, breakfast, lunch, dinner, Filipino food, international cuisine, family dining, Conde Nast Johansens' Awards For Excellence 2025, Best Breakfast, show kitchen, cake counter, bread display, fruits, smoothies, aromatic herbs, spices, delectable, culinary escapade, family-friendly, picturesque setting
description: Experience the award-winning Saffron Cafe! Enjoy a delightful breakfast, lunch, or dinner featuring a rich selection of international and Filipino dishes.  Indulge in our interactive show kitchen, delectable cake counter, and more in a picturesque, family-friendly setting. Recently awarded Best Breakfast at the Conde Nast Johansens' Awards For Excellence 2025.
content:
Page: Dine
Discover the aromatic delights of Saffron Café, where the enticing fragrance of herbs and spices captivates your senses. Recently awarded Best Breakfast at the Conde Nast Johansens' Awards For Excellence 2025, Saffron Café offers a breakfast experience like no other. Enjoy a rich selection of international cuisine prepared live by our skilled Chef during breakfast. Immerse yourself in the interactive show kitchen theaters, treat yourself to our delectable cake counter and bread display, and experience the variety at our fruits and smoothies bar.  
Saffron Café offers the essence of a family-friendly dining experience, serving breakfast, lunch, and dinner in a picturesque setting. During lunch and dinner, our menu features comforting Filipino and international dishes, promising a diverse and gratifying culinary escapade.

name: Mosaic Latin Grill
keywords: Mosaic Latin Grill, Latin cuisine, Tomahawk steak, seafood, fine dining, ocean views, Chef's Table, grilled meats, exotic spices, wine collection, romantic dinner, special occasion, celebratory meal, upscale restaurant, sophisticated dining
description: Experience the fiery passion of Latin flavors at Mosaic Latin Grill.
content:
Step into Mosaic Latin Grill, where every meal is a celebration. Here, the heat of the grill meets the soul of Latin flavors, transforming the finest meats and freshest seafood into something unforgettable. Our legendary Tomahawk steak? It’s just the beginning.
Picture this: the sizzle of prime cuts over an open flame, the rich aroma of exotic spices filling the air, and the rhythm of ambient music setting the mood from the Chef’s Table. Every bite tells a story—of fire, passion, and the bold spirit of Latin cuisine.
Pair your feast with a rare vintage from our exclusive wine collection, perfectly matched to enhance each smoky, charred, and spice-kissed flavor. And with sweeping ocean views as your backdrop, the experience is as intoxicating as the pour in your glass.
Mosaic isn’t just a restaurant—it’s an escape. A place where sophistication meets fun, and every meal is a moment worth savoring.

name: Floating Breakfast
keywords: floating breakfast, crimson boracay, luxury breakfast, in-pool breakfast, private plunge pool, unique experience, memorable moments, romantic breakfast, luxurious resort, boracay, philippines, breakfast in bed, poolside breakfast, hotel amenities
description: Enjoy a luxurious Floating Breakfast at Crimson Boracay.
content: Elevate your mornings with a signature experience at Crimson Boracay — our Floating Breakfast. Delight in a stylish start to your day as you savor a delightful morning meal in the serenity of your private plunge pool. Create unforgettable moments against the backdrop of our luxurious surroundings, making each breakfast a unique and indulgent experience.

description: Plan your dream wedding at Crimson Hotel Filinvest City, Manila.
content:
Your Dream Wedding Begins Here
Discover stunning wedding setups, exquisite banquet options, and personalized services designed to bring your vision to life. 
From grand ballrooms to intimate spaces, Crimson Hotel Filinvest City, Manila sets the stage for a timeless "I do," complemented by expert service to set the perfect scene for your big day.
